title: Textile, 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: chintz; mordant for black painted by brush, then dyed; plain weave foundation. (chintz)
dimensions:
Warp x Weft (a): 49 x 51 cm (19 5/16 x 20 1/16 in.)
Warp x Weft (b): 32.5 x 10 cm (12 13/16 x 3 15/16 in.)
description: a) Insects, abstracted mounds, and sprays of flowers tied with ribbons scattered over the ground, with an elaborate scrolling border on the left side. (b) scrolling border only. In black on a white ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: chintz; mordant for black painted by brush, then dyed; plain weave foundation. (chintz). Gift of Josephine Howell. 1973-51-72-a,b.
